title: European Union slashes planned tariffs on China-made Tesla EVs, other Chinese firms
content: The European Union on Tuesday said a planned tariff on Tesla vehicles being imported from China would be cut to 9% from 20.8%.
summary: The European Union on Tuesday said a planned tariff on Tesla vehicles being imported from China would be cut to 9% from 20.8%.

title: Morgan Stanley International chair among missing in Sicily yacht sinking as search continues
content: The 56-meter sailing boat, called "The Bayesian," was hit by a violent storm around 4 a.m. local time on Monday with 10 crew and 12 passengers on board.

title: Singapore introduces measures to cool the public housing market
